• Car Accidents

    Have you been injured by medical error? By law, health care professionals are required to provide a standard of care in addressing your needs.
  • Asbestos Exposure & Mesothelioma
    Asbestos Exposure & Mesothelioma If you have a diagnosis of Mesothelioma, there are recognized causes of this terrible disease as a result of exposure to asbestos.
  • Slip and Falls
    Slip and fall accidents are the most common claims in premise liability lawsuits.

description:
Ronald J. Resmini Law Offices, Ltd., is a family-owned Providence law firm founded by highly respected attorney Ronald Resmini. Our personal injury law firm has been assisting victims of negligence from all across the state of Rhode Island for over 40 years. In those 40-plus years, we have earned the reputation for providing compassionate, yet aggressive, legal service, not only to those suffering after motor vehicle accidents but also to those who are suffering after any of the following

Animal bites

Medical malpractice, including nursing home negligence

Premises and product liability, including negligent security

Trucking accidents

Bad faith insurance claims and legal malpractice

Drunk driving accidents

Catastrophic injuries

Sporting accidents

Lead paint and mold toxic exposure

In addition to representing accident victims in personal injury lawsuits, we also represent clients in related matters. We proudly assist Rhode Island's residents as they seek workers' compensation benefits, including those who were initially denied benefits but wish to appeal. We also represent family members who lost loved ones to fatal accidents as they pursue wrongful death compensation.

If you or someone you love is a victim of negligence and you live in the state of Rhode Island, you can turn to Ronald J. Resmini Law Offices, Ltd., for representation upon which you can depend. We will fight to protect your rights as a victim as we work to achieve your goals through a settlement or by taking your case to trial. Learn more today by taking advantage of our law firm's offer of a free initial consultation.
